ngiemboon: Aa mèŋ Jẅíndè, nyìŋ gẅie à faʼa fàʼa Yěsô Keleto, ńgwɔ́ fɛ̌ Jÿâg. N túmo yɔɔn ŋwàʼne ńnáa mbwó pi pie Tá wege Ssé la tóŋo gẅí. À kwoŋo gẅí ńne ńtÿɔ́ʼte gẅí, ńdɔgɔ ńzẅíʼte Yěsô Keleto.
en: Jude,   a servant of Jesus Christ and a brother of James:

ngiemboon: Á poŋ ngie e Ssé ne ńtsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mí, ńne ńnéŋe mbʉ́lè na pi, ńne ńgÿo pi ne ńkẅiʼi ńjúʼu ngie à kwoŋo gẅí kwàʼ mboŋó.
en: May mercy, peace, and love be multiplied to you.

ngiemboon: Meshǔ pɔ́ɔn petʉ̀nzẅìŋ, n kɔ̌ɔn ńzɔ́gɔ ńtsɔ́ɔn tsɔ̌ɔn léŋweʼe ŋwàʼne ńnáa mbwó pi, á na páʼ e Ssé ka gÿo pege metsèm pú ńtsẅɛ́. Táʼ, n ka neŋé tà ḿbú ńgyá fʉ̀ʼɔɔn ngie á zɛ́te ngie n ŋweʼe ńdɔg ńkẅiŋte gẅí lémaʼ ncù na nò Yěsô Keleto gie e Ssé la cʉ́me mbwó pege pʉ̀a Ssé, é maʼ tà mmó le mǒ gÿo. Yɛ̌ nò gwɔ́ pɔ́ yémɔʼɔ́ ndàʼ; atsɔ́ té ńdáʼa ńgíŋe ńgwɔ́ wó wɔ́.
en: Dear friends, although I was eager to write you about the salvation we share,   I found it necessary to write, appealing to you to contend for the faith  # 3 1Tm 6:12; 2Tm 4:7 that was delivered  # 3 2Pt 2:21 to the saints once for all.

ngiemboon: N gɔɔn páʼɔɔn nue tsɔ́ pʉ̀a kéen ńzɔɔn shú ńkúu tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, pɔ́ ne sele shÿó nò mbòŋo gie e Ssé yege la lɔg ńcÿó gʉm yégè, púʼu lépʉ́le ńgÿo menò shʉ́ mɔ́b. Pɔ́ lɔgɔ púʼu, ḿmoŋe Yěsô Keleto, á gwɔ́ ndàʼ Ndè wege, yé gíle yé zɔ gẅiin wégè. Pɔ́ ée pʉ̀a tepòŋ, ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie ntyě sǎg páʼ Ŋwàʼne Ssé la láʼ ńgɔɔn ntí ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gie e kuʼu na pɔ́b.
en: For some people, who were designated for this judgment long ago,  ,# 4 1Pt 2:8 have come in by stealth;  # 4 Gl 2:4; 2Tm 3:6 they are ungodly,  # 4 Mk 7:22; Rm 5:6 turning the grace of our God into sensuality and denying  # 4 Ti 1:16; 2Pt 2:1; 1Jn 2:22 Jesus Christ, our only Master and Lord.

ngiemboon: N ne ńkwoŋo lékímte gẅí tsɔ́ nò gie pi cwoŋo ńne ńzsé mboŋó, á gwɔ́ páʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la kẅile pʉ̀a pé pà Ésàlayɛ tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Egíbtò tà pɔ́ tsẅɛ́, á gÿo ńgʉa tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b ńgÿo pʉ̀a pie é kaa záb ntʉ́m na yé wɔ́ kwéte.
en: Now I want to remind you, although you came to know all these things once and for all, that Jesus   saved a people out of Egypt and later destroyed those who did not believe;  # 5 1Co 10:1–11

ngiemboon: Pi kímte nò mecÿɔ́ʼ Ssé pie é la gwága jʉʼ gie e Ssé tÿɔgɔ́ wɔ́b wó, ńgwáʼa yɔ́b jʉʼʉ lenéŋè, ńne ńtsɔ́ɔn ye mvfò. E Ssé la kwɛ́ɛ wɔ́b ndàʼndàʼ lé metsɛ̂n, ńnéŋe wɔ́b tsɛ̀ɛ mwòon nzém, pɔ́ ée wó ńzẅíʼte ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ ye lyɛʼɛ́ lÿò gie mé ge láʼ záʼ mentsaŋ.
en: and the angels   who did not keep their own position but abandoned their proper dwelling, he has kept in eternal chains in deep darkness for the judgment on the great day.

ngiemboon: Pi gíŋe ńkímte nò tÿǒsoŋo Sondɔm mbɔɔ ye Ngomɔɔ, tà mbɔɔ ye metsɔ́ metÿǒsoŋ mie pâ pɔ̌ la teme pàa, ńkímte páʼ pʉ̀a metÿǒsoŋ ŋwɛ́ la gÿo nò tepòŋ pɔ́ páʼ mecÿɔ́ʼ Ssé pɛ̌. Pɔ́ la ne ńgÿo menò shʉ́ tà sáʼa sǎʼ, ńdɔg mbùm yɔb ńkúbe shÿó menò mie e Ssé la záb. Áa na fʉ̀ʼɔɔn pɔ́ nuŋte tsɛ̀ɛ mmɔ̌g gẅie é té ndàʼa ḿbyé wɔ́. Á lɔgɔ ńgɔɔn nò mbwó wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ.
en: Likewise, Sodom and Gomorrah   and the surrounding towns committed sexual immorality and perversions,  # 7 Or and went after other flesh and serve as an example by undergoing the punishment of eternal fire.  # 7 2Th 1:8

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pie é ka shǔ ńkúu tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi ŋwɛ́ gÿo pɔ́ páʼ pʉ̀a pie é laa tsɛ̀ɛ mɛ̌ metÿǒsoŋ. Pɔ́ kwaŋte menò mie é té tyé, á cʉa púʼu, pɔ́ lɔg mbùm yɔb ńgÿo menò shʉ́. E Ssé gɔɔn nò pɔ́ gwág gwǎg. Pɔ́ zoonte mezẅìge mie é gẅiin legúʼ.
en: In the same way these people #— #relying on their dreams #— #defile their flesh, reject authority, and slander glorious ones.

ngiemboon: Tá mbà Míshÿɛ̀ɛ gẅie aa tándá mecÿɔ́ʼ Ssé la te púʼu gÿo. Á laa lyɛ̌ʼ gie pɔ́ Sátà la ne ńzoŋo nò na mbùm Mǒonsê, à te túu lɔ̌ʼ yé ńdɔg ńzoonte yé wɔ́. Tà ńcʉ́ʼ púʼu, mbà à la gɔɔn pɔ́ ndàʼ ngie: «Á poŋ ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a néŋ ngɔ́ʼ twó gù.»
en: Yet when Michael   the archangel  # 9 Lk 1:19; 1Th 4:16 was disputing with the devil  # 9 Mt 4:1,10; Ac 13:10 in an argument about Moses’s  # 9 Ps 77:20; Mt 8:4; Heb 3:2 body, he did not dare utter a slanderous condemnation against him but said, “The Lord rebuke you! ”

ngiemboon: Táʼ, á gʉa na pɛ̌ pʉ̀a, pɔ́ zoonte mmó té ne ńzsé páʼ á gwɔ́; ńgʉa na shúm sie pɔ́ zsé yɔ́b nò mǒ pɔ́ páʼ menɔ̀ɔn mbàʼ pie legye sɔ́b té wó wɔ́, sɛ̌ shúm gÿo pɔ́ pyé pyě.
en: But these people blaspheme anything they do not understand. And what they do understand by instinct #— #like irrational animals #— #by these things they are destroyed.

ngiemboon: Ndòon ee twó pɔ́b nue pɔ́ cʉmé na mánzsè we Kayiŋ, ńne fʉate menò ńdɔgɔ ńdaba nkáb páʼ Mbalam. Pɔ́ ée púʼu, mbà pɔ́ kéen ńkwé, á nue pɔ́ kéen ńtʉʉ twó mbwó Ssé páʼ Kolé.
en: Woe to them! For they have gone the way of Cain,   have plunged into Balaam’s error  # 11 Nm 22:5; 2Pt 2:15 for profit, and have perished in Korah’s rebellion.  # 11 Nm 16:1

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ée pʉ̀a pie é cʉŋe nzẅìŋ gẅí, á fʉ̀ʼ gie pi mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ cuʼté ńne ńjÿó shúm, pɔ́ tó fʉʼó ḿpfɛ́ɛ mmó tɛʼ, ńnú melùʼ tɛʼ. Pɔ́ té shʉ́ kú, ńkwaŋ pɔ́ ndàʼ yɔ́b twó. Pɔ́ ée páʼ mbʉ̀ŋ gie e kwɔ̌ʼ tà mé ne ńzẅíʼte ngie e lú, afóm kaa la, ńgwɔ́ páʼ metÿǒ mie ée těen ńzéme ntɔ̌ɔn wɔ́, tà mbɔɔ na fʉ̀ʼ gie é kɔʼɔ́ zém, ńgwɔ́ páʼ metÿǒ mie é léen ḿbʉe, ḿbú ńkwé.
en: These people are dangerous reefs   at your love feasts  # 12 1Co 11:17–22; 2Pt 2:13 as they eat with you without reverence. They are shepherds who only look after themselves. They are waterless clouds carried along by winds;  # 12 Pr 25:14 trees in late autumn #— #fruitless, twice dead and uprooted.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ne ńdɔgɔ mefàʼ tepòŋ mɔ́b, ésaa jʉʼ páʼ megẅɛ̌ tepòŋ mie máŋʉ́ à kwéʼe, é lu ssé ńtéme na ngʉ̀ŋe ntse, fùfùʼ we sa jʉʼ la. Pɔ́ ée páʼ mecÿɔ́ʼsaŋ pie é tsɔ́ʼɔ, éfím, e Ssé la nyɛte jʉʼʉ yɔ́b gie pɔ́ ge láʼa é gwɔ́ pɔ́ wó, á tsɛ̀ɛ mwòonnzém.
en: They are wild waves of the sea, foaming up their shameful deeds; wandering stars   for whom the blackness of darkness  # 13 Mt 6:23; Jd 6 is reserved forever.  # 13 2Pt 2:17

ngiemboon: Énɔ̀g gẅie aa na mejwoŋó sɔɔnmbʉ́a léfó na Ándàm, à la tʉ́ njÿó ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ Ssé gẅie é líe wɔ́b ńgɔɔn ngie: «Pi júʼ, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge lɔg mecÿɔ́ʼ pé pe Ndʉalʉ̌a, é tó tà e pú ńgyɔ́ɔn gyɔ́ɔn tà ńgwaa ńgwɔ́ mé le sáŋ ńzsé nzẅìŋ wɔ́.
en: It was about these that Enoch,   in the seventh generation from Adam, prophesied: “Look! The Lord comes with tens of thousands of his holy ones  # 14 Dt 33:2; Dn 7:10; Mk 8:38; 1Th 3:13; 2Th 1:7; Heb 12:22

ngiemboon: Á lélɔg ńŋag pʉ̀a metsèm, ńnéŋ ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ twó pʉ̀a tepòŋ metsèm ńtí mefàʼ tepòŋ mie pɔ́ la faʼ. Éfó na páʼ pɔ́ la tʉʉ twó mbwó Ssé, tà mbɔɔ na shwóŋè ntsèm gie á pÿɔ́g pÿɔ̌g, á gie pʉ̀a tepòŋ ŋwɛ́ pie é té mekùʼ gẅiin, é lǎ gɔɔn na Ssé.»
en: to execute judgment on all and to convict all the ungodly   concerning all the ungodly acts that they have done in an ungodly way, and concerning all the harsh things ungodly sinners have said against him.”

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a ŋwɛ́, é néŋe fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm, anò ne ńgyáŋa wɔ́b gyáŋ, pɔ́ ne ńzẅɛ́te zẅɛté, ńnéŋe ńgÿo pɔ́ mmó gie mbùm yɔb ne ńtsóte wɔ́b ngie pɔ́ gÿo. Pɔ́ ée fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm, éshwóŋo pɔ́ shwóŋè gie pɔ́ lɔgɔ ńŋáʼte ŋaʼté, ńgwɔ́ lʉte nyìŋ ńne ńzsé pì gie pɔ́ ge jÿó na yé.
en: These people are discontented grumblers, living according to their desires;   their mouths utter arrogant words, flattering  # 16 Lv 19:15; Dt 10:17; 2Ch 19:7; Pr 28:21 people for their own advantage.

ngiemboon: Tá á gʉa na pi, mbà meshǔ pɔ́ɔn, pi kímte menò mie megàŋntúm Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto la tʉ́ njÿó ńtsẅii mbwó pi.
en: But you, dear friends, remember what was predicted by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ la gɔɔn ngie: «Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ na fʉ̀ʼ gie njÿó ge magá, epʉ̀a gẅe gẅí, ńgÿo menò tepòŋ na ntí gie mbùm yɔb ne ńtsóte wɔ́b légÿo púʼu.»
en: They told you, “In the end time   there will be scoffers  # 18 2Pt 3:3 living according to their own ungodly desires.”

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ zɔ̌ ée pʉ̀a pie é maʼa fagte tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a Keleto. Pɔ́ gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie pɔ́ júʼu soŋ nnɛ́ pɔ́b, à Zẅìge Ssé té na pɔ́b wɔ́.
en: These people create divisions and are worldly,   not having the Spirit.

ngiemboon: Tá ńgʉa na pi, mbà meshǔ pɔ́ɔn petʉ̀nzẅìŋ, pi kẅiʼi ńtʉte tʉte, ńne ńkúʼte mmó gie pi la záb ntʉ́m gẅí mǒ. Yɛ̌ zɔ̌ cÿó gie gẅi lenéŋè tyé mǒ. Pi tóŋo Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a, à lɔg metʉ̀ mé ńkẅéte gẅí lésẅíŋte Ssé.
en: But you, dear friends, as you build yourselves up in your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit,

ngiemboon: Pi gÿo e Ssé ké ńne ńkẅiʼi ńkwoŋo gẅí kwoŋ, ńne ńzẅíʼte ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto ge gÿo gÿo pi gẅiin legwɔ́ tèmì, á nue à tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mí.
en: keep yourselves in the love of God,   waiting expectantly for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ for eternal life.

ngiemboon: Pi tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe pʉ̀a pie é ne ḿmʉ́ʼte mʉʼté
en: Have mercy on those who waver;

ngiemboon: Pi fó na mánzsè gẅie à gee né tsɛ̀ɛ mmɔ̌g ḿbeʼe wɔ́b, pɔ́ tsẅɛ́. Etsɔ́ pʉ̀a gíŋe ńgwɔ́ wó pie pi ge gíŋe tsɔ́ɔn mezìŋe mɔ́b, é gwaa tsɔ́ɔn, é ne pɔ́ɔn mà wɔb. Pi pɔ́ɔn mbɔɔ menzsǒ mɔ́b mie ncÿǒ menò tepòŋ ée mǒ.
en: save others by snatching them from the fire;   have mercy on others but with fear,  # 23 Rv 11:11 hating  # 23 Pr 6:16–19 even the garment  # 23 Zch 3:3–4 defiled by the flesh.

ngiemboon: Agùʼte gwɔ́ mbwó Ssé, yé gẅie à kuʼu létÿɔ́ʼte gẅí tà pi é le gwé. Yé gẅie à kuʼu légÿo pi kẅɛ, ńtyé na jʉʼʉ legúʼ gie kwàʼ yé aa wó tà lɔ̌ʼ á le na pi wɔ́, pi piŋ ńne ńkága kǎg,
en: Now to him   who is able to protect you from stumbling  # 24 Jn 17:12 and to make you stand in the presence of his glory, without blemish  # 24 Eph 1:4; 5:27; Php 2:15; Col 1:22 and with great joy,

ngiemboon: ée ndàʼ yé ńgwɔ́ Ssé. À la lɔgɔ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto, ńgÿo pege tsẅɛ́. Mè guʼte pɔ́ yé, yé zɔ gẅiin legúʼ, yé zɔ̌ gẅiin metʉ̀, yé zɔ̌ sáʼa pʉ̀a, páʼ à la láʼ ńzye, á ké ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ púʼu, tà ńkú fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, é láʼa gwɔ́ pɔ́ púʼu, á na ngùʼ nkɔ́ɔn né nkɔ́ɔn. À gwɔ́ pɔ́ púʼu!
en: to the only   God our Savior, through Jesus Christ our Lord,  # 25 Other mss omit through Jesus Christ our Lord be glory, majesty, power, and authority before all time,  # 25 Other mss omit before all time now and forever. Amen.
